articles.title: Bitcoin ticks back in Asia after Musk tweet sent price down 17% - The Star Online
articles.description: TOKYO/HONG KONG: Bitcoin rebounded to about $50,000 in Asian trading on Thursday after plunging as much as 17% after Elon Musk tweeted Tesla Inc had stopped accepting bitcoin to purchase its vehicles due to climate concerns.
